And to do they study, they need =
a controlled environment, not just one where they grab=C2=A0 random anecdot=
es from "all the users out there do hear this stuff".

So I still look forw=
ard to the entire study.=C2=A0 Why not post it, so we can judge for ourselv=
es what they got right and what they got wrong?
